problem_text:
(A. Tarski). a) Does there exist an algorithm for determining the solubility of equations in a free group?
b) Describe the structure of all solutions of an equation when it has at least one solution.
answer:
a) Yes, there does (G. S. Makanin, Math. USSR–Izv., 21 (1982), 546–582; 25 (1985), 75–88).
b) This was described (A. A. Razborov, Math. USSR–Izv., 25 (1984), 115–162).
